english.segment1: All creatures of our God and King. Life up your voice and with us sing. O praise Him, alleluia. Thou burning sun with golden beam. Thou silver moon with softer gleam. O praise Him, O praise Him. Alleluia, alleluia, alleluia
english.segment2: Thou rushing wind that art so strong. Ye clouds that sail in heav'n along. O praise Him, alleluia. Thou rising moon in praise rejoice. Ye lights of evening find a voice. O praise Him, O praise Him. Alleluia, alleluia, alleluia
english.segment3: Let all things their Creator bless. And worship Him in humbleness. O praise Him, alleluia. Praise, praise the Father, praise the Son. And praise the Spirit, three in One. O praise Him, O praise Him. Alleluia, alleluia, alleluia
english.segment4: Praise, praise the Father, praise the Son. And praise the Spirit, three in One. O praise Him, O praise Him. Alleluia, alleluia, alleluia
